Author: rzioma
Content:
SID is absolutely the best audio chip from the 8-bit times.

SID is pretty much The Holy Grail when it comes to replicas. Relatively ðŸ˜‰ large demand, relatively expensive and hard to emulate correctly.
SID has bunch of analog components inside - amps, filters and DACs. All with pretty unique characteristics.

GF180 is prefect for such a replica!

Author: rzioma
Content:
Once TinyTapeout opens support for analog designs with GF180 - it will be great for prototyping and validating all the analog components in separation.
Wafer.Space will be ideal for the whole chip tapeout.
